title: SET_PLAYER_MAY_NOT_ENTER_ANY_VEHICLE
content:
0x1DE37BBF9E9CC14A0xAF7AFCC4// SetPlayerMayNotEnterAnyVehicle
void SET_PLAYER_MAY_NOT_ENTER_ANY_VEHICLE(Player player);Parameters:player: The player index.Establishes a reset flag to prevent the player from entering any vehicle. Not that this native must be called every frame.
